title: Curvy semiserif logo for optometrist’s logo
content:
Hi guys, I am stumped by this one. Anyone has a clue?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803072059im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tompkins-Knight-and-Son_3496.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: Yves, it's [Philosopher](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803072059/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.google.com/fonts/specimen/Philosopher) by Jovanny Lemonad with assistance of Erico Lebedenco and now part of the Google Web Fonts directory.
